price: 34. Edde luk Qhiyaamah ayro, yeemene mari korosul yasuuleeh, anqasah.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
